latestAction.text: On agreeing to the Deal (GA) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

Mr. Sabo raised a point of order against the Deal (GA) amendment (A034). Mr. Sabo stated that the amendment sought to impose new duties and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
